name: POCKET SLAM PLUS
description:
Pocket Slam is a tribute to the old Capcom's wrestling game Slam Masters 2 but with a crossover between Capcom and SNK. This is a updade of the vanilla version and soon we will make a Pocket Slam 2 with more chars, stages and original soundtrack made by TheJetParadox

 Pocket Slam brings just wrestling chars to battle to fulfill his dreams of famous life on wrestling championship held by Victor Ortega and also Final Boss. All the 12 chars have a background and ending cutscenes.

The main change on this version is the add of two chars: El Stingray from Slam Masters and Patrick Van Heyting from Buriki One.


GAME SYSTEM

 How is based on Slam Masters 2, the game system is like a usual versus fighting game plus a grab system that is the key to use most of the grab attacks like regular throw, super throw, hyper throw and push enemy to the ropes.

 There is a new system called Rage Burst, when the chars turn the Super Gauge into a timer to provide Max Power for a short time period once per round. During Burst Mode all the super attacks are on the EX version, for some chars have chain combo and some air attacks change his effects.

LIST OF CHARS

Most of them are famous but anothers was classic and nostalgic from old franchises. All the chars have a balanced mechanics and adapted for modern times. Take a look at them:

- Gunloc - from Slam Masters series
- Clark Still - from KOF series, design based on KOF XIV

- Hugo - from Final Fight series, design based on SF III 3rd Strike

- Rainbow Mika - from Street Fighter Zero series, design based on SFV

- Angela Belti - from Power Instinct series, design based on PI Matrimelee

- Raiden - from Fatal Fury series, design based on KOF 13

- Zangief - from Street Fighter 2 series, design based on SFV

- Griffon Mask - from Garou: Mark of the Wolves, design from KOF XI

- El Stingray -  from Slam Masters series

- Patrick Van Heyting - from Buriki One

- King - from Tekken series, design based on Tekken 5 and SFxT

- Victor Ortega -   from Slam Masters series, based on Slam Masters 2

HOW TO PLAY

 There are files with instructions and list of moves for each char with the executable game file.  Basicly is a game with weak, medium and strong attack and the grab button works as attack anullation, too.

IT'S FREE, but Windows only.
